summary: In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, always sticks to her own moral code.
cast: Nargis|Sunil Dutt|Rajendra Kumar|Raaj Kumar|Kanhaiyalal Chaturvedi|Jilloo Maa|Kumkum|Chanchal|Sheela Naik|Mukri|Siddiqui|Ram Shastri|Fakir Mohammad|Geeta|Hameeda|Master Surendra|Mastan|Nawab Khan|Master Alec|Sitara Devi|Azra|Sajid Khan
title: Madre India
